newsitem.title: BELGIUM: BELGIAN ASLK, NMKN CUT CERTIFICATE RATES.
newsitem.headline: BELGIAN ASLK, NMKN CUT CERTIFICATE RATES.

text.p: Belgian banks ASLK-CGER and NMKN-SNCI said in statements on Friday they plan to lower the interest rates on their bank savings certificates.
From Monday CGER cuts five-year rates to 5.00 percent from 5.45 percent. From Tuesday, SNCI cuts five-year capitalisation certificate yields to 5.50 percent from 5.50.
Certificates with yields between one and four years are also lowered.
